column4: i need to change refresh rate which line i should edit HorizSync or VertRefresh?
i am using it now
i need to change my monitors refresh rate, which line i should edit HorizSync or VertRefresh?
from memory it's not quite that simple.
you (at least used to) have to know the ranges of both for the monitor that you're using
Although, looking at my xorg.conf, I think that HorizSync is the one that you want
you should just be able to restart X.  logout and select restart X server if you're using gdm/kdm (or press ctrl + alt + backspace, if you don't mind losing your session)
that's a really good move (gnome screeen resolution)
you were lucky :)
thx for help
opera cant use extensions of firefox
/usr/share/pixmaps/xchat.png ?
thx a lot
download the macromedia installer, then copy libflashplayer.so to ~/lib/opera/plugins/
lesshaste's thing will probably work too
can you repear me where do i need to put that file for opera+flash
sorry, was afk... libflashplayer.so to ~/lib/opera/plugins/
/home/<username>/lib/opera/plugins (~ is a shortcut to your home directory)
there is no lib folder in my home
in preferences --> advanced --> content --> Plug-in options...  what is your plug in path?
then try putting it in /usr/lib/opera/plugins then
